title: Ummmm Where is my reward ward skin ?
body: So i got my victorious maokai but not the ward skin? Do someone know why ?

replies.body:
After taking a quick peek at your account, I don't see why this happened. I'd recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can work with you to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Did you win ranked team games last season?  The ward skin was only earned by getting points from 5s or 3s ranked team wins.
